posts.post_content:
...lol who doesn't?  Yes, I know. :D

But nonetheless... it is the last card I need to fill this display of my favorite poses/HOFers from the t206 set. (before you ask, these are forged signatures that I did for the display.  I won't reveal my secret, because they're pretty darn convincing). 

[IMG]http://www.billykoehler.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/IMG_7113-1-scaled.jpg[/IMG]

My budget really restricts me to fair market value for a PSA/SGC 1.5-2.0.  If you have any leads, please PM me... or email me at [url]williammkoehler@gmail.com[/url] 

Thanks so much, and have a great weekend!
Billy Koehler
